sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const ProfileManagement = ({ onBack }) => { const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('main'); // 'main' or 'profile' const renderMainView = () => (
{/* Profile Header */}
{/* Profile Picture & QR */}
{/* QR Code */}
{/* QR Pattern */} {Array.from({ length: 36 }, (_, i) => (
))}
ID

Hello Noone

KYC Verified

Travel ID: trav2Steel

{/* Personal Information */}

Personal Information

Date & Birth
Nationality
{/* Documents */}

Documents

Passport

Manage documents in Wallet

Mobile
); const renderProfileView = () => (
{/* Profile Header */}

Profile

{/* Basic Info */}

Name

Date | Birth

Passport

Nationality

Mobile
{/* Family & Health Details */}

Family & Health Details

Emergency Contact

View/Add

Blood Type

Medical Conditions

{/* Logout Button */}
); return (
{/* Sticky Header */}
RAAHI
{/* View Toggle */}
{/* Content */}
{currentView === 'main' ? renderMainView() : renderProfileView()}
{/* Fixed Bottom Navigation */}
); }; export default ProfileManagement;
